title: unternet-co/maps
description: A Google Maps applet for searching for locations and getting basic data, such as a description, address, reviews, and ratings. Shows locations as pins on the map.

title: unternet-co/spreadsheet
description: A simple spreadsheet for organizing data, that the model can write to. Supports formulas.

title: unternet-co/tarot
description: A simple 'tarot reader' applet, which draws a card to tell your fortune. Ask a follow-up question about a specific scenario to get a reading.

title: unternet-co/calculator
description: A very simple calculator that can give you precise answers to any expression.

title: unternet-co/todo
description: Collaborate with a model to write a to-do list with checkable boxes.

title: unternet-co/rich-text-editor
description: A rich text editor, that can write a new buffer of text or append to an existing one.

title: unternet-co/codepad
description: Edit code collaboratively with an LLM.

title: unternet-co/crossword
description: A simple crossword puzzle. You can ask for hints, and get the model to fill out answers when you get it right.

title: unternet-co/web
description: Search & extract information from the web.

title: unternet-co/3d
description: A little toy for creating 3D models with natural language.
